title: Fix login page authentication
description: Users are experiencing intermittent login failures. Need to debug authentication flow.

title: Add user profile settings page
description: Create a new page where users can edit their profile information and preferences.

title: Optimize image loading
description: Images are loading slowly. Implement lazy loading and image compression.

title: Implement dark mode
description: Create a dark mode theme for the application

title: Fix responsive layout on small screens
description: The application layout breaks on mobile devices. Needs responsive design fixes.

title: Implement email notifications
description: Set up email notifications for user activities and system alerts.

title: Add data export functionality
description: Users need to export their data in CSV and PDF formats.

title: Update dependencies to latest versions
description: Several packages are outdated and have security vulnerabilities.

title: Implement search functionality
description: Add search feature to filter items quickly across the application.

title: Improve accessibility
description: Make the application more accessible according to WCAG guidelines.
